productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(il.extended_price) AS RentalValue_Month11 FROM oe_hdr oh JOIN invoice_line il ON il.order_no = oh.order_no JOIN invoice_hdr ih ON ih.invoice_no = il.invoice_no WHERE oh.rental_billing_flag = 'U' AND ih.invoice_date >= DATEFROMPARTS( YEAR(DATEADD(month, -11, GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month, -11, GETDATE())), 1 ) AND ih.invoice_date < DATEFROMPARTS( YEAR(DATEADD(month, -10, GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month, -10, GETDATE())), 1 );
calculationType: Sum of total sales amounts for calendar month -11.
